marketplace.name: My Claude Code Setup
marketplace.description: A complete Claude Code workflow featuring brainstorming, TDD-based planning, and parallel execution with intelligent model selection
marketplace.author: Ashish Thomas Chempolil

skills.name: Brainstorm
skills.description: Conversational brainstorming that refines ideas through targeted questions, triggers codebase exploration, and prepares context for planning

skills.name: Create Plan
skills.description: Creates detailed implementation plans with atomic steps, model selection per step, dependency labels, and embedded TDD specifications

skills.name: Execute Plan
skills.description: Executes implementation plans by dispatching agents based on step dependencies, following TDD with tests written before implementation

agents.name: Master Explorer
agents.description: Orchestrates multiple code and library exploration agents for comprehensive codebase analysis

agents.name: Code Explorer
agents.description: Deep codebase analysis exploring execution paths, architecture layers, and dependencies

agents.name: Library Explorer
agents.description: Researches external libraries, frameworks, and tools with documentation and best practices

commands.name: envision
commands.description: Quick command to trigger the envision workflow (brainstorm → plan → execute)
